title: From Giants to Geniuses: The Rise of Small Language Models
summary: I talk about small (instead of large) language models, and how they are becoming more and more important for the future of agentic AI.

title: Learn LLMs Only with Good Materials (Reasoning)
summary: I will recommend some good materials (checked manually by myself) for learning LLMs' reasoning.

title: Attention Variants
summary: I will talk about some attention variants, including GQA, MLA, and so on.
